com.epoch.utils

Class AuthUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.utils.AuthUtils

  • public final class AuthUtils
extends Object
    Manages password security.

      private static byte[] ALLACCESS
      Used for securitizing password.
      private static byte[] magic

      • magic

        private static final byte[] magic

    • Method Detail

      • verifyHashValue

        public static boolean verifyHashValue(byte[] passHash,
                                      String nonce,
                                      byte[] hashValue)
        Verifies a password.
        Authentication details
        browserserver
        <------------nonce
        ------------>h(nonce | h(password))
        Parameters:
        passHash - password that has been hashed
        nonce - key
        hashValue - h(nonce | h(password)) from client
        Returns:
        true if the hash value is verified

      • getNonce

        Get a random string to be used as nonce.
        Returns:
        a random String
